ProjectTitle: Sensory signalling in the bladder during urinary tract infections: mechanisms of sensitisation and implications for bladder function.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
28/07/2022
7. Sharing: do you already know which repositories you will use? For personally identifiable genetic, phenotypic, and clinical data you can consider EGA (https://ega-archive.org/) and for anonymized or animal derived data you can take a look at the EMBL submission wizard: www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/. For data for which there is no suitable disciplinary repository you can use KU Leuven RDR: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr where you can restrict access if needed.
label: good with suggestions
